definition: Papa Xi, nickname for Xi Jinping 習近平|习近平[Xi2 Jin4 ping2]

sentences.english: Mulan asked, her eyes bigger than ever.
sentences.chinese: 穆蘭眼睜得大大地問道。

sentences.english: From life machines to vaccination man has vastly improve the standard of living.
sentences.chinese: 從生命機器到疫苗接種，人們大大地提高了生活水平。

sentences.english: The effect of real-time water surface can consumedly enhance the immersion characteristic of virtual reality system.
sentences.chinese: 實時水面效果可以大大增強虛擬現實系統的沉浸感。

sentences.english: As a result, significantly impact on the stability of the solder.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一來，就大大影響了焊錫的穩定性。

sentences.english: The order of commendation from the general headquarters lifted up still higher the morale of the troops.

sentences.english: It actually has a much greater chance of fulfilling our stakeholder's needs.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，它還大大增加了滿足出資方需要的機會。

sentences.english: The country jumped their oil prices.
sentences.chinese: 該國突然大大提高了石油價格。

sentences.english: High-efficiency water heaters can drive down home energy costs.

sentences.english: The fiber and protein boost allows a small serving with great contentment.

Such advance studies can greatly expedite regulatory approval.

sentences.english: It ignores one’s audience and waters down your message.
sentences.chinese: 它忽視了聽衆，也把要傳達的信息大大沖淡。

sentences.english: The instrument improved efficiency of inhaling oxygen, reduced infection and droped the amount of oxygen consumption down.
sentences.chinese: 增加吸氧效果，減少感染，大大地降低氧損耗量。

sentences.english: It will increase sharply with the decrease of the diameter of sieve pore.
sentences.chinese: 隨着篩孔直徑的減小，壓力梯度大大增加。

sentences.english: "the black screen" to the computer user's harm, overestimates greatly.

sentences.english: Finally, the quantity of data was reduced greatly by subdividing whole scene into smaller subunits. The experiment results pr…
